parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Particles </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets randomization of particle source parameters. Correspondence between CfgCloudlets class param names and command array of params:
<code>particleSource [[setParticleRandom]]
[
	lifeTimeVar,
	positionVar,
	moveVelocityVar,
	rotationVelocityVar,
	sizeVar,
	colorVar,
	randomDirectionPeriodVar,
	randomDirectionIntensityVar,
	angleVar,
	bounceOnSurfaceVar
];</code> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> particleSource [[setParticleRandom]] [lifeTime, position, moveVelocity, rotationVelocity, size, color, directionPeriod, directionIntensity, angle, bounceOnSurface] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> particleSource: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lifeTime: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] in format [randomX, randomY, randomZ] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> moveVelocity: [[Array]] in format [randomX, randomY, randomZ] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> rotationVelocity: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> size: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER7</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> directionPeriod: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER8</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p9</name>=<value> directionIntensity: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER9</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p10</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] (Optional) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER10</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p11</name>=<value> bounceOnSurface: [[Number]] (Optional) <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER11</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code> _particleSource [[setParticleRandom]] [0, [0.1, 0.1, 0.1], [0, 0, 0.5], 0, 0.1, [0, 0, 0, 0], 0, 0, 45, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ParticleArray]], [[setParticleCircle]], [[setParticleParams]], [[ParticleTemplates]], [[setParticleClass]], [[particlesQuality]], [[setParticleFire]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 03, 2013 - 15:35
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]<dd class="note">Support of parameter <i>bounceOnSurface</i> ([[Number]] - 0-1) is in the game since Arma 3 version 0.74. It's variability in speed's loosing in collision with ground. Requires collisions with ground enabled by script command [[setParticleParams]].<br>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
